pr_title: Ensure that HotRestartPersistence/UserCodeDeployment configs are not overwritten during parsing

timeline.message: Ensure that HotRestartPersistence/UserCodeDeployment configs are not overwritten during parsing
Ensure that HotRestartPersistence/UserCodeDeployment configs are not overwritten during parsing

timeline.bodyText: I guess these changes belong to #17878 and have already been merged. If that's right, could you please rebase on master to get the actual change reviewed? Otherwise LGTM 👍

replies.bodyText: I just messed up the order and put expected in place of actual in assertions. This change just reorders the parameters
